pkgmetadata.longdescription: Lind/Mehlum Utest // An implementation of Lind and Mehlum's (2010) doi:10.1111/j.1468-0084.2009.00569.x Utest to test for the presence of a U shaped or inverted U shaped relationship between variables in (generalized) linear models. It also implements a test of upward/downward sloping relationships at the lower and upper boundary of the data range.
